content: So we are not looking at situations where we would go only merchant and totally merchant, but we are willing to do projects where part of your revenues are guaranteed through a contract or through regulation and part of the revenues depend on, letâs say, on merchant revenues, because thatâs what the storage does well, move production from certain hours in the day to other hours where prices are higher and knowing that our current portfolio is 99% or 98% contracted, we believe that in the storage we can do that combination of contracted/regulated and some merchant revenues.
